reviews.text: wondeful pilsener, bitter enough, fruity yeasty  taste, good carbonatation. Very happy to be able to drink a real pilsener in a brewpub.
Clear amber poor with medium pancake like head.  Flavour that betrays long days harvesting barley in the post american neo gothic landscape.  Notes of travelling fairs and plate spinning jesters.
... 10 = not a good beer but : cheap, and compared to the other beer same price same %alcohol, itâs not too bad
